fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Destructive: Your hand limit is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaosâ€™ Night phase attack. *You must also choose a role to disguise within the first phase of the game.* Affects up to Susceptible checks.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a non-special card of your choice [4 uses, 1 CD] 
- Copycat: Choose a player. Copy one of their non-unique abilities. [2 uses, 2 CD] 
- Blame: Choose a player. All attacks you play this phase will appear to come from that player. [2 uses, 1 CD, Unique]
- Pound: Deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage to someone at the end of the phase. Gains a use for every other person you Kill. [1 use, Recharging, 0/2]*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
